Because while I don't think that Kat is OP, her laning phase is where you'd expect her to be exploitable but due to the fact that her Q is point and click, is multi target, gives her a damage buff that she can trigger with another point and click ability and is resourceless, it's hard to exploit her because she will eventually just out poke and out sustain you. If you however you manage to get a few good trades in, she can just stand back and farm with Q.

It makes no sense to me why champs like Riven have a stun, a knockup, a shield, an execute, AA empowerment and tons of mobility, yet don't rely on any resources. 

Why does Garen have a point and click silence, mobility, AOE, an execute, an instant boost in tank stats and endless amounts of health regen, yet is resourceless.

At LEAST Vladimir uses HP.

They are one trick ponies, that's why. You can see what they are going to do before they even do it, there is no difference AT ALL with how they are played when they are played well. If you play them enough, when you go against them you can tell where they are, what they will do, when they will do it and can counter them without even trying.

BUT, if you get caught out once, good luck.

People like Riven can afford to be resorceless because they have other weaknesses, like umm... hmmm....
